naslov: Privlaka, moderna, šarmntna kamena kuća, bazen, s dodatnim zemljištem (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Šarmantna rustikalno-moderna kamena kuća u srcu Privlake, nadomak mora. Smještena u samom centru slikovitog dalmatinskog ribarskog mjesta Privlaka, ova jedinstvena kamena kuća od 158 m2 spaja tradicionalni dalmatinski šarm s modernim elementima dizajna. Na ograđenom zemljištu od 266 m2, uz dodatnu parcelu od 300 m2 gdje je moguća gradnja dodatnog objekta, nudi savršenu ravnotežu privatnosti i otvorenog mediteranskog ugođaja. Kuća se sastoji od dvije etaže i zasebnog pomoćnog objekta od 18 m2 uređenog kao ljetna kuhinja. Prizemlje čini dnevna zona s udobnim dnevnim boravkom, blagovaonicom i kuhinjom, koja vodi prema stražnjem dvorištu s kominom za roštiljanje. Središnji element interijera su unutarnje stepenice obložene bračkim kamenom, koje vode na prvi kat, gdje se nalaze dvije prostrane spavaće sobe, svaka sa svojom elegantno uređenom kupaonicom. Rustikalni detalji poput ciglenog zida u kuhinji i betonskih stropova premazanih zaštitnim slojem stvaraju autentičan i profinjen ambijent. Posebna pažnja posvećena je kvaliteti gradnje i udobnosti – kuća je odlično izolirana, opremljena podnim grijanjem i klimatizacijom u svim prostorijama. U dvorištu se nalazi bazen okružen zidom od cigle opeke koji osigurava intimu uz prostor za objedovanje i vanjski tuš, te ljetna kuhinja, smještena u zasebnom objektu, s kamenim pločama i tradicionalnim dalmatinskim stilom, dodatno doprinosi šarmu ove nekretnine. Ova predivna kuća nudi spoj tradicionalne dalmatinske gradnje i suvremenog luksuza, savršena za one koji traže miran mediteranski život u blizini mora, a opet s daškom modernog komfora. Vlasništvo uredno. ID nekretnine: 1064-1 Kontakt informacije: 00385 91 900 7040 Marko Čakarun marko@plusnekretnine.hr Charming rustic-modern stone house in the heart of Privlaka, close to the sea. Located in the very center of the picturesque Dalmatian fishing village of Privlaka, this unique stone house of 158 m2 combines traditional Dalmatian charm with modern design elements. On a fenced plot of 266 m2, with an additional plot of 300 m2 where it is possible to build an additional building, it offers a perfect balance of privacy and an open Mediterranean atmosphere. The house consists of two floors and a separate auxiliary building of 18 m2 arranged as a summer kitchen. Theground floor consists of a living area with a comfortable living room, dining room and kitchen, which leads to the back yard with a fireplace for grilling. The central element of the interior is the internal stairs lined with Brac stone, which lead to the first floor, where there are two spacious bedrooms, each with its own elegantly decorated bathroom. Rustic details such as the brick wall in the kitchen and concrete ceilings coated with a protective layer create an authentic and refined ambience. Special attention was paid to the quality of construction and comfort - the house is well insulated, equipped with underfloor heating and air conditioning in all rooms. In the yard there is a swimming pool surrounded by a brick wall that provides intimacy with a dining area and outdoor shower, and a summer kitchen, located in a separate building, with stone slabs and traditional Dalmatian style, further adds to the charm of this property. This beautiful house offers a combination of traditional Dalmatian construction and modern luxury, perfect for those looking for a quiet Mediterranean life near the sea, yet with a touch of modern comfort. Ownership in order. Contact information: 00385 91 900 7040 Marko Čakarun marko@plusnekretnine.hr
